disorderland.tips_add_des: The drop rate of {0} Marks is increased by {1}.
disorderland.tips_key_lack: No Blank Maps left. Try again tomorrow
disorderland.title_drop_select: Select the Mark type you want
disorderland.note_rite_not_select: This stage will only drop the selected Spells
disorderland.note_stone_get: Clear all adjacent stages to activate ({0}/{1})
disorderland.note_sweep: Clear the highest stage of each type
disorderland.note_chance_add_1: Clear more stages for a higher drop rate bonus.
disorderland.tips_hero_add_des: Deploying 1, 2, or 3 designated heroes increases the ATK and HP of all allies by <color=@000083>75%</color>/<color=@000083>150%</color>/<color=@000083>300%</color> respectively.
disorderland.note_buff_add: The Artifact provides the following bonuses to all deployed heroes.
disorderland.note_hero_season: When the following heroes are deployed, the entire team will receive bonuses.
disorderland.note_sweep_empty: Cannot sweep until the instance is cleared.
disorderland.note_add_70: Legendary Arcane Mark Drop Rate Bonus
disorderland.stone_des_201: Unlocks Chalk Blessing, increasing the chance of obtaining Crude Marks by <color=@90>15%</color>
disorderland.stone_des_202: Unlocks Jade Blessing, increasing the chance of obtaining Common Marks by <color=@90>15%</color>
disorderland.stone_des_203: Unlocks Sapphire Blessing, increasing the chance of obtaining Uncommon Marks by <color=@90>10%</color>
disorderland.stone_des_204: Unlocks Amethyst Blessing, increasing the chance of obtaining Rare Marks by <color=@90>10%</color>
disorderland.stone_des_205: Unlocks Amber Blessing, increasing the chance of obtaining Epic Marks by <color=@90>5%</color>
disorderland.stone_des_206: Unlocks Ruby Blessing, increasing the chance of obtaining Legendary Marks by <color=@90>0.5%</color>
disorderland.stone_des_207: Unlocks Arcane Blessing, increasing the chance of obtaining Arcane Marks by <color=@90>0.5%</color>

disorderland.stone_des_209: Unlocks Arcane Blessing, increasing the chance of obtaining Arcane Marks by <color=@90>5%</color>
